website_summaries.verdict: This ultra-popular coffee container promises to keep your coffee fresh with its exceptional build.
pros: Product vents out co2 produced by coffee while simultaneously keeping oxygen out of container
Several different color and size options available
cons: Many customers wished the company offered a larger canister

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I can grind our coffee beans for an entire week and store in this container. Stays fresh. My only wish is that there be a storage option for the "spoon" that comes with it. I don't like to put the spoon inside the container to store it. I try to store the spoon in the hinged area in the back (there's enough space without damaging the container), but it tends to fall from that location.
customer_reviews.author: miamic09

customer_reviews.title: Lid is too heavy to allow canister to stand
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, but a bad combination of materials and design. Even when full of ground coffee, the item can't stand on its own with the lid open; I have to hold it so the heavier lid doesn't pull the canister over on its side. The body should be made of a heavier material.The materials are of good quality, there's just not enough weight in the body to support the lid. Maybe if it is kept full of whole beans it would serve better.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material for being over 30$
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the material used is very light gage. I expected better quality. The lid is plastic and the dated dials don't turn properly. I am considering returning it. I am amending my review (from 3 stars to 4) only because the customer service is fantastic. I expressed my concern about the quality and value of the canister. I was quickly approached via email by this company. They wanted to make sure I was happy with my purchase and gave several options that were above and beyond what most companies would do. Great customer service here. Other companies could learn a lot from coffee gator's customer service.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing coffee
customer_reviews.text: Well made. The gray color looks really smooth. The locking mechanism works well. Definitely better than keeping the beans in the bag. Also comes with stainless steel 1/8th cup (30 g) measuring cup.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. The can seems nice at first with all the fancy features, but the one thing it was supposed to do is keep my coffee fresh. I am sad to see my favorite coffee fresh from the roasters go bad just a little after a week. In my opinion you are much better off with a vacuum sealing canister. This turned out to be a fancy overpriced tin can I’m just glad amazon makes returns so effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Shen

customer_reviews.title: Good looking canister but...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 2 months now. It does seem to do the job of keeping my coffee fresh which is what I ultimately need it for. However I do have some gripes - the dial at the top is not aligned with the numbers, and others have complained about this also. This really cheapens the product and diminishes my perception of its quality. Also, while the scoop is a nice inclusion, it would be great if there was somewhere to hang it beside the canister. Otherwise, it looks great... Minus the assembly quality
customer_reviews.author: HTS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality coffee container with extras.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on a Lightning Deal and figured I'd give it a go. My current PrepWorks container doesn't keep my coffee beans as fresh as I thought it would. Shipping was fast. The red is a bit more like Candy Apple Red. I can't stop staring at it. Hahaha. There are extra filters included, didn't expect that. :) Also included is a 1/8 scoop. I haven't used it but cosmetically, it is beautiful. No more stale coffee for me. Will update after I've had some time to use it or if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: N. Duong

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 5 of these coffee gators. I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 of these coffee gators. I ordered 2 of the large blue ones for decafe beans, two of the large red one for cafe beans, and the regular size grey one for premixed half-cafe for the countertop. As you can see from the pictures, the seal/lid on the grey container aligns perfectly; however, the seals/lids on the larger containers do no align. I tried my hardest, wiggling the lid this way and that, to get them to align with negative results. I had already boxed up one of the blue ones when it occurred to me to take pictures. I gave the grey one 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: info2share

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a vacuumed seal canister that bit the dust after several years of use. I decided not to go with another vacuum seal because you have to replace the batteries every so often and it can only be used for coffee beans and not ground coffee. With the Coffee Gator I can use it for beans or ground. The inside is also metal making it easy to clean. The calendar on the top is useless for me since I'm a devote coffee drinker and there is no way the beans or grounds would go stale. Nicely make product and a good locking latch on the top. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Walker

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This storage container for coffee keeps my ground coffee fresh for a long time. The seal allows for little to no air for oxidation of the the coffee which stabilizes freshness and flavor once the beans have been ground. Only negative comment would be that I needed to have purchased a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: cveyrad

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a nice companion to the press. Seals well, too!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Fan

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and in 3 months the finish started coming off. The bottom started dropping which created an uneven surface under this when on flat surfaces
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I roast my own beans at home, so purchased a second one to rotate the beans I'm using with the ones I've just roasted that need to sit for 24-48 hours. These are attractive and great at keeping freshly roasted beans fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Words

customer_reviews.title: Little jars fall apart easily and container doesn’t latch properly
customer_reviews.text: This really sucks having to leave this review because I do love coffee gator stuff. We have their French press and love that but for the second time now we have had the little jars fall apart. The large container is awesome but doesn’t latch properly. Maybe we just had bad luck and received a few defective units. The French press does work flawlessly and I’d highly recommend it. Hands down the best I’ve ever had! I wish I could count on coffee gator being a bit better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Gator
customer_reviews.text: This coffee canister (or Gator) is very well made, works really well and keeps my high octane coffee fresh...and all at a very nice price..very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Crane

customer_reviews.title: What my coffee has been missing!
customer_reviews.text: I've never invested in a coffee container before, and this was definitely the right choice! I love coffee and I'm now mad at myself that I've been doing it, and myself a disservice by not putting my grounds in one of these containers sooner. Every time I open it, a wave of amazing fresh coffee aromas greets me. I've only been using it a few weeks, but the coffee grounds have not lost ANY flavor, and is are fresh as the day I bought them. By comparison, I brewed a cup from grounds that were still sitting in the coffee bag I purchase them in, and it had absolutely no flavor left whatsoever. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works? It works.
customer_reviews.text: It actually seems to work. I was skeptical but willing to give it a try, as I need a better way to store ground coffee since I've put off buying a coffee bean grinder, due to reviews being all over the place on quality, even for expensive models. I'm currently buying coffee about every 10 days and having it ground at the roaster. Since I've been using this canister I'm surprised to find I'm not having to throw out the last cup of grinds due to staleness. I like the bale on this, it's good and tight. Spoon not so helpful as I use a full scoop for my French press. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Veriloq

customer_reviews.title: For people who drink lots of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a lightning deal. It's way too big for my needs, but the small one isn't big enough, and the medium one is not that much smaller than the large one. But it's attractive and of reasonably good quality and works the way it's supposed to. Holds more than a pound of coffee. I can put a 1-pound bag of coffee beans inside the canister, and there's room left over. I don't know if there's anything to the CO2 filter or not. The coffee tastes the same as it always did to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Entity

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Dark Red version, it is a really nice Burgundy, true to Picture. It is also nice and heavy duty. I'm really pleased with the Quality. I also like the larger size, since I buy 1 bag of reg. coffee and 1 bag of Decaf and combine them. I can almost get them both in there, other containers are much smaller. Since coffee bags are 12 oz, it would be nice to have a container that's 24 oz, but most people don't do what I do, so I can deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karo56

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! But definitely read the instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This canister is really nice! Packaging and info cards very well done ( if you’re into that) which is what made me read the instructions. DEFINITELY READ THE INSTRUCTIONS! You’re not supposed to get the lid wet because of the valve that’s in it. So, check that out before use. I buy coffee in 32oz bags, the canister won’t hold the entire bag. That’s my only negative for this product but it didn’t say it would hold a 32oz bag of coffee so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Red Canister!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two Large Red canisters to sit along side my two large stainless steel Gator canisters and they all function as well as they look! I really like the brilliant red color and smooth shiny finish, very sharp looking and very well made, and does the job perfectly. These canisters keep my whole coffee beans as fresh as the day I opened the bag until they are gone. I like that Gator is now providing a packet of 4 replacement valves with each red canister. My silver canisters purchased a few months ago did not come with extra valves. Maybe they are doing this now, not sure. Very good product (whatever color), they work and I completely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: No*BoUnCe

customer_reviews.title: All sorts of small pieces and it looks great too!
customer_reviews.text: This container has a great many functions that I am sure serve some purpose and most likely performing each of those functions excellently. For me, it is but a red aluminum container that seals tightly and looks great in my kitchen. No one pound bag of coffee is in it for more than two weeks because that is how long it takes me to consume it. My coffee habit is relentless. You can get this canister because it looks great and/or it has the valves and the numbered thing. Either way its doing the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Ola

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING! I am beyond pleased with this storage canister
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! I am beyond pleased with this storage canister. Function meets style for my kitchen. Beautiful blue color is even more gorgeous than the photos! The "timer" on the top is a great feature as well. My coffe grounds stayed fresh a month past my "timer's due date" for disposal. The Coffee Gator family is wonderful and you will be impressed with their customer service. I am buying this as gifts for all my coffee junkie friends! Thanks, Coffee Gator!!! (No, I was not given this item in exchange for my review. This canister is just that badass!)
customer_reviews.author: ForeverAmazonMomCustomer

customer_reviews.title: A great coffee storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: I grind 12 oz bags of coffee beans at the grocery store and bring him to put in this container. I was worried that getting the medium size would be too little, but it’s what I should have gotten after using the large for a few weeks. No matter, I’m very happy with my purchase and strongly recommend if you are looking for a storage solution. My only criticism is that I have to think for half a second to make sure that the lid is properly aligned when closing. Pretty minor!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wenrich

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps coffee fresh
customer_reviews.text: I love these canisters! I ordered three of them. I purchased the large, medium, and small. I can't believe how fresh the coffee stays in them. They really do make a difference in coffee freshness! And they look beautiful sitting on my newly created coffee bar. I purchased the dark gray/black. My friend saw them and was equally impressed. She has just purchased three of her own! A great product and I would highly recommend to anyone who likes their coffee fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very cheaply made. Chrome plated hardware that is very thin. The paint is rough, thin and cheap. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Griffey

customer_reviews.title: Mine isn’t staying fresh :/
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I’m using this wrong? I didn’t buy it for the beans, I bought it to keep k cups in that usually need to stay in their ziplocked bag, but are a pain to dig out of the bag and don’t look as cute as this canister does. That being said, it doesn’t work for that. It looks good, so I guess I’m glad I have it, but the kcups are noticeably less fresh in this than they are when left in their bag. Again, maybe there’s something I’m missing.
customer_reviews.author: KatieLady682

customer_reviews.title: Great container if you’re in to coffee like I am
customer_reviews.text: Really do love this coffee bean keeper. the latch, container all works as good as anything I’ve bought from a brick and mortar store. Love the idea of being able to rid the container of CO2. Only reason I didn’t give it five stars, is that the date dials on top are not the easiest to move or work. Other than that really like this container for the price. Just ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A few cons but keeps my beans fresh!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this I didn’t use it very frequently but recently I’ve been roasting my own coffee and I really like how the cansiter works and it seems to keep the beans very fresh. The only downside is the date tracker on the top has poor printing on it and it’s hard to set so the printing has started to come off. I guess it’s not a huge deal but if I’m going to track the date I would like it to be a functional part of it. I would consider buying this canister again if the date tracker was better quality and easier to set the month.
customer_reviews.author: Dsums

customer_reviews.title: Great way to store your coffee beans
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I've bean looking for (get it?). Great way to store your coffee beans. I'm not sure why this would be, but I don't seem to have any static in my grinder hopper now that I keep my beans in this. Very attractive too. The large holds closer to 2 lbs of whole bean. The directions state to just wipe the inside with a damp paper towel to clean, but when I did that, the paper towel came away black, so I would suggest washing it on the inside with dish soap. The lid is removable, and I would do that first to keep the lid and CO2 filter dry.
customer_reviews.author: KirkinSanMarcos

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee canister
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 large Gator coffee canisters in grey and really like the sturdiness and sleek look of these canisters. We leave the canisters out on our kitchen counter because of the great style. The canisters seem to be holding the freshness of our coffee beans and continues to provides a great cup of espresso every day. I believe these canisters are worth every penny and we are going to purchase additional Gator products
customer_reviews.author: Tim L

customer_reviews.title: Exterior color bleeds on to counter after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: So, normal use sliding the canister 8 inches or so towards me on the kitchen counter (white), the exterior color (red) has worn off. The mark on the counter is not permanent but I would expect a more durable exterior. The can works fine but they just need to put a little more into the durability of the color.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R Mace

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Coffee Canister
customer_reviews.text: Our second large coffee canister, 64 oz. arrived Sunday. It is beautiful! The numbers and letters on the dials are easy to read, and a clever tool for keeping track of when we purchased the coffee beans. Also included is a small, matching glass jar that is perfect for storing the filters. When we discovered an issue with our first canister, customer service took care of the issue within hours. We were so pleased with the first canister, that we bought a second one in a different color. Now we can buy more coffee beans for our cold brew coffee maker. We are happy customers of Coffee Gator and highly recommend the Coffee Gatorcoffee canister.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but light weight - looks sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome - light weight and worked perfect on my cruise. I ground all my coffee before we left - I put over a lb of coffee in this too. It lasted my husband and I 12 days with our French Press. Will also be perfect when we aren't on a cruise and just at home for a MUCH easier way to store coffee and scoop it out instead of digging in a bag. Just get it you will love it. Now I can't wait to get the travel pour over coffee mug from Gator. Everything we have from them we love.
customer_reviews.author: BobcatB

customer_reviews.title: 2020 model with magnet scoop is nice
customer_reviews.text: Just received the 2020 version with the magnet and scoop. It is a great idea, but unfortunately one of the magnets were no longer attached to the canister and the date wheel has a dull finish. Taking both of these in account, I wondered if I received a refurbished unit and briefly considered returning it, but it's too much a hassle. I tried super glue, but perhaps I'll have to try Gorilla glue because the magnet fell off with Super glue.
customer_reviews.author: Cath

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Husband subscribed to Black Rifle Coffee Club so I got this as a gift for him. It’s one of his favorite things now. It keeps his coffee fresh, and he loves the travel container because he travels for work. He’s even taken the whole thing on longer work trips, and it held up in his suitcase during baggage handling and the flight. It’s pretty easy to wash. We’re both extremely satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best in coffee storage.
customer_reviews.text: A friend of ours has been a coffee roaster of small, artisanal batches of locally sourced coffee for over 25 years. In the past we have tried countless storage methods to hold these delicate coffees, but were always disappointed with the quick loss of freshness and flavor. Always in search of suitable storage, when we came to the US last year we purchased a Coffee Gator. Search over. We were so pleased by the performance of this storage container that we purchased a second Coffee Gator this year. When our coffee roaster friend comes to our house, he always comments with amazement that our coffee tastes like he just roasted it. What better endorsement of a product can you get?
customer_reviews.author: Steve Y

customer_reviews.title: Great product and color
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright red color. This is not a burgundy color... well maybe just a little but more red. It even has instructions advising how to use the controls on the outside of the lid. I wish the logo was on both sides of the canister....just a goofy thought and no big deal. I bought large and small canister. One holds whole beans while the other holds the ground coffee. I use the coffee so fast I can't say this is keeping the beans fresher longer.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: The included scoop is also of excellent quality and is included with each container
customer_reviews.text: The exterior finish is high quality and is textured making it easier to grip. I've had my coffee beans in them for two weeks now and they still seem fresh. The included scoop is also of excellent quality and is included with each container. The locking mechanism is secure but it's important to make sure the gasket is directly over the opening before locking the lid into place. I find the date indicator confusing to use and difficult to adjust. Other than that I would recommend this product. I have three of the large containers and use them in my coffee shop and plan to buy the small sizes for ground coffee.
customer_reviews.author: spinningmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Fresh coffee every day
customer_reviews.text: This canister is great, everytime I open the canister my coffee smells as fresh as the day I bought it. It holds more than I thought and I am going to buy a med. because, well these are great canisters and I love to grind my own, but my husband prefers pre- ground. So the large for his pre-ground coffee and a med for my coffee beans. Love the scoop and the free small bottle. If I grind more than I need for my morning espresso I put it in the small jar for the next cup.
customer_reviews.author: megamom

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Happy overall with the canisters. I purchased 4 large and 4 small ones. They're tough enough to keep the coffee safe. The hinges are solid and completely hassle free. All canisters came with small scoop type spoons, coasters, and many replaceable breathers. One drawback I felt was I had to thoroughly clean and wash them on the inside because there was a layer of manufacturing residue, as with most similar products. And about the freshness, the only thing that would make them better is if there was a way that allows the coffee to be taken out without reintroducing air, but that could be a different product altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Saqer Nabeel Alarmali

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Coffee Beans Fresh As When First Opened.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to seal really well! I keep a 1# bag of beans inside and with the package rolled down after opening it smells as fresh as when first opened every time I open the cannister to measure out more. The only concern I have is the handle on the clasp seems a bit thin. So far not a bending issue. Hopefully it stays that way. Very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Two on hand
customer_reviews.text: This is the second coffee gater container we purchased in two weeks because we really liked the first. We grind our own coffee beans - have for a number of years. We find the little “breather button” in the lid an excellent idea, and having two attractive coffee gater cans allows small one pound purchases of coffee beans advantageous. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Slocum

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.text: A great product, does what it needs to do. It seems to seal well, keeps my ground coffee fresh. I really just wanted something to make my morning routine a little easier, as once you get near the bottom of a bag of coffee, it gets harder to get my hand in there and get a scoop out without making a mess. This is a nice wide-mouthed container, enabling effortless scooping! To top it off, it looks sharp sitting on my counter, too. Easily holds one bag of ground coffee, with plenty of room left over.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee fresh
customer_reviews.text: I use the large size Gator for keeping my coffee beans fresh. I grind about 3 days worth of coffee and use the small size Gator to keep the grounds fresh. Using the Gator canisters my brewed coffee always tastes fresh and smooth. With store bought coffee grounds the fresh smell was usually gone after the first week and the brewed coffee was flat and lacking any flavor that you want in a cup of coffee. I've found the Gator canisters are the best way to keep your coffee beans and ground coffee fresh and flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: DMeek

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a large red gator and the month dial would not turn , i tried everything nothing worked. So i reached out the the coffee gator and they stood behind there product 100% . I had a replacement in just a couple days with no questions asked. I would recommend this product. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert La Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Nice, long-lasting, solid canister
customer_reviews.text: This canister seals solidly, securely and easily. It is packaged well, protecting against bumps that could otherwise cause dents. The CO2 one-way valve appears easy to replace. The package contain a couple of extra valves which results in the canister being viable for at least three years. One pound of roasted beans fills this canister about 2/3 to 3/4 full.
customer_reviews.author: William Jorth

customer_reviews.title: This canister is amazing for storing and preserving your coffee
customer_reviews.text: This canister is amazing for storing and preserving your coffee! It's built very solid and the sealing clasp feels very secure. I really appreciate that they provided extra filters for the vacuum seal as well! I'd definitely recommend this to anyone that's looking for a great coffee holder.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonS

customer_reviews.title: They sell working and non working valves.
customer_reviews.text: This prodyct fails to do the one thing it's supposed to do. Ruins coffee. The fact that they even send defective co2 release valves is ubsurd. If one does buy this product which I don't recommend, test it out by only putting a few ounces coffee in to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let Coffee Gator Get a Bite Out of Your Coffee Storage Needs
customer_reviews.text: This coffee canister from Coffee Gator has exceeded my expectations! Since I buy high quality coffee beans, I need an airtight storage vessel to store the beans prior to grinding them. The large Coffee Gator has met this requirement and then some. The Coffee Gator looks great on my counter top and the aluminum design reflects the canister's high quality. I'd definitely buy the Coffee Gator canister again if the needs arises!,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit pricey, but you can really see the quality. I’ve had my canister for almost a year and it still looks new. I really like the aesthetics of the Coffee Gator products, and the company emailed me to make sure I was happy with my purchase. I just purchased their French Press directly from their site (because It wasn’t available on Amazon when I wanted it) and cant wait to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Claud

customer_reviews.title: Gator Stainless Steel Container for fresh coffee bean
customer_reviews.text: I am a coffee snob that gets fresh coffee bean that are a mild to dark aromatic roast. I have to grind them before making my pot of coffee. This Gator Container was perfect. It keeps my fresh coffee beans fresher longer. Then they are just right for my Gator coffee press. In my coffee press I make Ice brewed coffee and hot coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Buffum

customer_reviews.title: Good, but overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: The canister comes with packaged, works well, looks nice and the included steel scoop is really nice. However, the dials on top are cheaply made and hard to turn. After about 2 months of use, the ink on the inner dial has been rubbed off almost completely. Fix the dials and lower the price - then we're in 5 star territory.
customer_reviews.author: MrMedley

customer_reviews.title: The freshest coffee
customer_reviews.text: What a brilliant product. I'm always skeptical when I see multiple 5 star and 4 star reviews. I've had too many bad experiences with products rated as such. However, this storage canister is awesome. The coffee is as fresh as it was when I ground the beans. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod S. Hagenman

customer_reviews.title: Still the Best Container I've used
customer_reviews.text: I now own 5 or 6 of these and I recently bought two for my daughters who like my fresh coffee. I've been using these containers every day for several years now and the stylish containers have maintained their seal. The hinges are good as well. I personally like the smaller ones, but I bought these larger ones as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Boss

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this canister and the first one that arrived was defective. The lid was slightly misaligned and there was a gap when closed. It was replaced and I am happy with the properly working canister. Had it for about 7 months. Keeps my coffee fresh. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee fresh!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well made container. It delivers what is promised - fresh tasting coffee. We buy coffee in three pound bags at Costco and needed a storage container that would keep the coffee fresh until used. This delivers! We'll need another to hold the quantity in each bag, and will buy another. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it about a week. Very good quality materials - it also came with extra filters so that was nice. I bought the large and when it arrived , it was a bit smaller than I thought. It could not hold the two (2) 12 oz. bags of whole coffee beans I had. The date indicator on the top is a nice feature The only thing that would be nice is if the scoop was a bit bigger and if there was a way to attach it to the container. Really though ... no major complaints - just wish it was a tad bigger for buying a large. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton S.

customer_reviews.title: The gator is easy to operate. Follow the instructions for first time cleaning. Fill it with beans
customer_reviews.text: My only regret for the Coffee Gator is that I did not buy two! Every morning, the coffee aroma fills the kitchen as soon as I open the Gator to make a pot of coffee. Update: Coffee Gator is still working well. After purchasing a two pound bag of coffee , we purchased two more Gators . Feeling like a squirrel, but ready it we are snowed in😉.
customer_reviews.author: Truburque

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 5 of these at different points in time. All are still in use. They are aesthetically pleasing, but, more importantly, they do a fantastic job of keeping the coffee beans fresh. While pricier than some similar coffee canisters, it has been well worth the additional cost.
customer_reviews.author: S. Waide

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Storage
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if the company made a larger storage unit that holds beans in the quantity that I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Catlett

customer_reviews.title: Great canister!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this coffee canister, skeptical that it would keep my favorite coffee beans fresh and delicious. After using for several weeks, I no longer have any doubts! The locking lid fits tightly, and when I open it, the fresh aroma is incredible. I love the candy apple red color I picked, beautiful beside my Kitchenaid coffee maker. I would definitely purchase again, and have already recommended to family members.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Casey

customer_reviews.title: About to buy another one!
customer_reviews.text: I liked it well enough to order a second one for additional brands of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: A. N. Katzenstein

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a couple of these. Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Despite having a rust issue with one of these cans i am updating my review to positive. Not only did the company reach out to me they also replaced the defective can with a new one. So far no complaints. I understand that things can happen with products and variables outside of the manufacturers control can contribute to different situations. All i can ask as a consumer is that the company stands behind their product and tries to correct any legitimate concerns. They have done that very well hence my updated review. Thanks. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: GermanBoyUSA

customer_reviews.title: A DEFINITE MUST-BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This canister is one of those products you didn't know you needed till you owned it. I have the large, attractive red container. Amazing that I had never realized how my coffee was losing all aroma (and a lot of flavor) after opening the bag. I now enjoy inhaling the fabulous aroma from the canister as I prepare my coffee each morning. Who doesn't LOVE the smell of coffee?!!
customer_reviews.author: Trenta

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered two of these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, I love them so much. Very stylish so I can leave them on my counter near the coffeemaker. I use the red one for ground coffee and the grey one for creamer. You can't go wrong with these well-made canisters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your beans optimally fresh
customer_reviews.text: Lovely color and comes with several air vents so they can be switched out. Apparently air should be able to get out from stored coffee but not in to keep coffee optimally fresh. I love coffee and grind my own every morning and did not know this about the beans. So now I know.
customer_reviews.author: Violetwrites Leftow

customer_reviews.title: Great Containers
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I ordered three of these, Stainless for me, Star & Stripes for my youngest son, and the charcoal gray for my oldest son. We all love them. It was odd, that the one for my oldest came with a mini canister inside, so I guess you can take a little coffee with your wherever you go, but the other two didn't. Anyway, all great products and will keep my Valhalla Java nice and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Furna

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my beans fresh
customer_reviews.text: This coffee canister is great - well made, stylish & functional. Keeps my decaf beans fresh & easy to get to. Highly recommend - look for them on sale, pick a canister that would look nice in your kitchen & place your order. You will not be sorry...BigBill
customer_reviews.author: BigBill

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Coffee Canister
customer_reviews.text: A very nicely made product. Arrived on time, well packaged and in perfect condition. I haven't had it that long, but it seems to work exactly as described. The canister seals very tightly. I have a pound of beans in there now and the coffee this morning tasted great. I think the additional CO2 valves and stainless coffee scoop are nice touches. Can't wait to see how well it works over the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Marek

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.  Very over priced
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Rough, unfinished metal inside and out. Looks like something you could buy at Dollar General or Family Dollar for $5. Lid doesn't align to canister very well. Latch is flimsy. Color look nice. I like that they provided extra filters for timely change out. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ToddLa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, highly recommend for a coffee lover
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a coffee snob! I found this for his coffee to keep it fresh and to make sure it tastes great. He loves it. Especially the turn too for when I last refilled it with ground coffee. He says he notices a freshness to it as well. He drinks 14 cups a day and this is great, it stores 1 months worth of ground coffee
customer_reviews.author: Teelyb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Scoop, but otherwise very nice canister.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this thing so I'll update when I feel it's appropriate. It does feel nicely built and has a ton of space for your coffee. Only thing I wanted to bring to attention of the 1/8 cup scoop. If for some reason that's it to you, don't rely on it. The handle already broke. The rest of the set is great though.
customer_reviews.author: DAAT ONE GUY

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and strong coffee flavor forever!!!
customer_reviews.text: What I like? The spoon is the perfect size for my delonghi moka coffee maker. What I don’t like? The balance of the lid when it is almost empty. I use it for ground coffee. Now the flavor stays longer and stronger
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Huertas

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: I buy my beans at Costco in usually a 2.5 or 3 lb bag. One large canister won't hold half of the 2.5lb so I bought another and STILL won't hold the 2.5lb. Why do they call it "large" then? Also the price went down $5 as I'm writing this review. Thanks! P.S. Not worth $30.
customer_reviews.author: C.C. Mel

customer_reviews.title: Airtight
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest addition in my cupboard for holding my coffee beans .i loved it so much I bought one for keeping my teabags fresh and my granola from getting stale . Since I live in Hawaii things get stale quick here .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Yes I like them very much. The smell of the coffee is very fresh as well as the flavor. The only issue for me is the price. I would like more but living on a fixed income does not allow that. I should not have bought these but I have some expensive coffee and I wanted something good to preserve it.
customer_reviews.author: cheryllene towner

customer_reviews.title: Great canister, wish it held more.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee canister just be aware of the size, I have the large and it holds maybe between a pound, pound and a half. Coffee Gator does have amazing customer service. Just wish it was larger.
customer_reviews.author: D Bizzle

customer_reviews.title: This canister is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee canister will keep your coffee fresh for a while. There is a date tracker on the top of it, which is super handy for remembering when you put the coffee in it. So far I've had my coffee in this canister for about a month and it tastes as fresh as a just opened bag.
customer_reviews.author: josh hall

customer_reviews.title: Great camp coffee
customer_reviews.text: We could not be more impressed by this coffee gator! We started using it for camping, to replace our Percolator With this, and have been very impressed. Our first pot of coffee sealed the deal! No coffee grinds, just right coffee flavor. Got the coffee container as well, which is great for keeping it fresh. Do yourself a favor, and get this now!
customer_reviews.author: Amandadrake75

customer_reviews.title: Excellent container
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and keeps coffee consistently good until I have used up each bag. MUCH better than leaving it in the bag and using the metal strap on the bag to reseal and squeezing the air out. I have purchased another one for a second kind of coffee beans.
customer_reviews.author: Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality of Printed Months on Dial.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June 2018. The printed numbers on the month dial on top of the can have almost all worn off and disappeared within a few months, making this feature pretty useless. The month dial has also been very difficult to turn. Otherwise I have been happy with this product, so the reason for 3 stars instead of 1..
customer_reviews.author: ThereseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Canister, great size, too!
customer_reviews.text: This canister holds one pound of whole coffee beans with room to spare. It seals nicely and keeps the coffee beans fresh. We go through a pound of coffee in less than a week, so I know the beans are very fresh. The company is very attentive and has emailed me to make sure my experience with this product is satisfactory. They communicate well and are very courteous. Things I really appreciate in today's world!
customer_reviews.author: Ryebird (Rae)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coffee Canisters
customer_reviews.text: Love these canisters. We bought three in different colors so we can easily tell which coffee without having to open. Keeps coffe fresh longer. Can place fresh beans or ground coffee. Love the look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome storage option!
customer_reviews.text: The containers are really pretty! We've ordered 4 thus far, so you could say things are getting pretty serious. They're durable, and I really like the dials that let you keep track of when the coffee should expire....but let's be honest, I'm not sure that we ever have coffee hanging around that long! I wish they came in a super large size - but that's being picky. I'm sure we'll be ordering more as we find more coffee that has to be in our lives :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Perry

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Gator
customer_reviews.text: An excellent storage vessel for your coffee, easy to pour into, easy to get your hand into to get the coffee, and the lid stays tight to keep the coffee fresh. Delivery was two days as promised. I will use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Smart purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this large container for years and finally bought it--actually 4 of them in different, attractive colors. I am using them to store ground coffee, coffee beans, tea bags, and hot chocolate mix. So far, I am well-pleased with the freshness they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Janiece Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My only negative experience come from the free extra jar. I love that it was there however shoving styrofoam into this container was a hassle to clean. Little bits everywhere and not wanting to come out. Other than that this is such a great product. Well worth the money and I will be buying other products from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Coffee Gator is light wieght--which is a good thing. So far
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Just received this about a week ago. Using as instructed with no issues. The Coffee Gator is light wieght--which is a good thing. So far, it seems to keep my coffee beans as fresh as the day I bought them. A whole pound of coffee beans fit with no problem. The Coffee Gator people also sent me a couple of e-mails with some great coffee tips.
customer_reviews.author: oldlady60

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We got the orange one which has a good looking, slightly textured matt finish that has held up well for 8 months now and looks great on the counter. No chipping or dulling. With a little careful compaction, we can just barely fit two 10oz bags of Café La Llave Espresso Fine Grind into it at once. The dial is useless to us as we drink it much faster than it can go bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid coffee canister.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and happy with appearance and weight. I only gave four stars because I am not sure how effective the other features are especially since it is a gift I am not able to give any other information.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: great product but need a larger size
customer_reviews.text: I love how fresh my coffee beans are even a month after my purchase however, it would be nice to have a larger container available as the 1.1lb container does not help me with my 2.2lb purchases of Lavazza beans. I would rather not have to purchase 2 containers to handle this mainly due to limited counter space and the extra cost as well. Otherwise, I am totally happy with the container.
customer_reviews.author: midiman55

customer_reviews.title: Bill Keener Likes
customer_reviews.text: Liked the first so much, I purchased a second. One for espresso beans, the other for cold brew beans. Each beautiful in simplicity. Thank you so much for a quality, well constructed product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Keener

customer_reviews.title: Beans stay so fresh
customer_reviews.text: I just decided to up my coffee game and was looking for a coffee container. The Gator caught my eye and had great reviews at the time so I took a chance on it. It turned out to be absolutely amazing. The coffee stays super fresh the airtight container does not leak at all and the filter for CO2 releasing works amazingly. Whenever I'm in the market for another one I will definitely get another Gator. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good product = Fresh coffee + happy consumer
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has remained true and kept our coffee fresh. We love popping it open and getting that whiff of fresh coffee when we are about to make some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Got this and it looks great! Seems to be well thought out
customer_reviews.text: Just Got this and it looks great! Seems to be well thought out... will update if anything is less than 4 stars and will go to 5 if it keeps the coffee fresher than expected! Only draw back is the hinge on the back seems a little flimsy...it causes the top to swivel around and you have to pivot the top just right for the seal to lign up correctly. Should not be this much give and movement... would be 5 stars if i did not have to pivot the top to align the top to fit flush against the round opening.
customer_reviews.author: JB Fulmer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The sealed canister method is the way to go. This is a good reminder.
customer_reviews.text: A picture is worth a thousand words! The sealed canister is perfect for storage and looks beautiful in my coffee bar! Thanks for reminding me of how to do coffee the sensible way. I chose the darker charcoal color so it always looks clean, no coffee dust.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The gunmetal color was great for him he said it matches his gun metal ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson for his 24th birthday. He's really into coffee and told me this is what he wanted for his birthday but he didn't know what kind I would get. He was very impressed with the coffee gator he couldn't wait to get his coffee in it and try it out he had the biggest smile. The gunmetal color was great for him he said it matches his gun metal coffee cup.
customer_reviews.author: Juliann M Hageman

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat Coffee Gator cannisters
customer_reviews.text: The cannister is great, but everything they make is great. This is the third of their cannisters that I have purchased. That should be enough to hold me, but if I need another one it will be Coffee Gator. And, nope, no one solicited me, paid me, or gave me anything to say this.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color (red) well built, sturdy and keeps coffee FRESH!!!!!!! Great size and really pleased with product. Will buy from seller again! Seller really seems to care how you like the item so I can imagine customer service is good, too!
customer_reviews.author: moondog

product_meta.title: Coffee Canister - Coffee Gator Stainless Steel Coffee Container - Fresher Beans and Grounds for Longer - Date-Tracker, CO2-Release Valve and Measuring Scoop - Large, Gray
feature_bullets: Fresh, Fresher, Freshest. You pay for prime quality ground and whole beans, so it makes sense to take care of them. This premium stainless steel container looks the bee's knees and loves your tea and coffee like a Kardashian loves a selfie

Safe from flavor-destroyers. Coffee naturally emits harmful co2 which needs venting away. Our zero-BPA canisters have innovative freshness valves to release co2 but lock out oxygen. Airtight, sealed containers stop this process and wreck coffee

Track freshness for a dream brew for you and your guests. Sitting on top of the steel clasp seal lid is a calendar wheel. Logging the purchase or expiry date reduces waste and puts a stop to throwing precious coffee in the trash

Drink better coffee. Unlike the competition, we never compromise on quality, service or your personal happiness. Our military-grade vault is no different in delivering more smiles per cup. The search for coffee that makes you smile ends right here

We’re only happy when you are. Thousands of satisfied customers show that. Plus, our 100% satisfaction promise means you can choose this coffee storage solution with confidence. This time tomorrow you could be enjoying the experience of a lifetime

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,267 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
